titleStmt.title: The reconciler of the Bible: wherein above two thousand seeming contradictions throughout the Old and New Testament, are fully and plainly reconciled. Being necessary for all those that desire to understand the sacred scriptures aright unto salvation. / By J.T. minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Thaddaeus, Joannes, fl. 1630.

titleStmt.title: The reconciler of the Bible: wherein above two thousand seeming contradictions throughout the Old and New Testament, are fully and plainly reconciled. Being necessary for all those that desire to understand the sacred scriptures aright unto salvation. / By J.T. minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Thaddaeus, Joannes, fl. 1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Simon Miller at the Star in St. Pauls-church-yard, neer the west end,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Joannes Thaddaeus.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb. 1. 1655"; the I in the Roman numeral imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
